edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action

? AddHCPAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action.AddHCPAction

  • public class AddHCPAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for Add Personnel page (addPersonnel.jsp). This just adds an empty HCP/UAP, creates a random password for them. Very similar to AddOfficeVisitAction and AddPatientAction
    ??:
    Andy Meneely
